Name: Sea Battle: Annihilation
About the game: Take control of a small battleship and with limited ammo fight against submarines coming your way. To defeat submarines, you will be able to use various weapons and powerups which will make your battleship true force on the sea. Features 36 crazy levels Campaing and survival mode Customizable difficulty levels and game speed 6 powerups 8 types of enemies, each with different behaviour Different times of day Sounds of the sea combined with battle atomsphere Tutorial on how to play Keyboard and gamepad support Controls Keyboard Left/right arrow: move left/right A: fire left side D: fire right side Q: left powerup E: right powerup Gamepad support
